Package org.lgdcloudsim.datacenter

Class CollaborationManagerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.datacenter.CollaborationManagerSimple
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollaborationManager
public class CollaborationManagerSimple extends Object implements CollaborationManager
Manage the collaboration among datacenters. This class implements the interface CollaborationManager.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous, Anonymous2

  • Field Details

    • changeCollaborationSynTime

      private double changeCollaborationSynTime
      The interval time for periodic adjustment of collaboration areas.

    • isChangeCollaborationSyn

      private boolean isChangeCollaborationSyn
      whether the collaboration areas is adjusted periodically.

    • collaborationMap

      private Map<Integer,Set<Datacenter>> collaborationMap
      The collaboration Map.

    • datacenterIdMap

      private Map<Integer,Datacenter> datacenterIdMap
      The datacenter id Map.

    • cloudSim

      private Simulation cloudSim
      The Simulation.

    • collaborationGroupQueueMap

      private Map<Integer,InstanceGroupQueue> collaborationGroupQueueMap
      The map of the collaboration id and the InstanceGroupQueue. The key is the collaboration id, and the value is the InstanceGroupQueue for the center scheduler of the collaboration with the collaboration id.

    • collaborationCenterSchedulerMap

      private Map<Integer,InterScheduler> collaborationCenterSchedulerMap
      The map of the collaboration id and the center InterScheduler. The key is the collaboration id, and the value is the center InterScheduler of the collaboration with the collaboration id.

    • centerSchedulerBusyMap

      private Map<Integer,Boolean> centerSchedulerBusyMap
      The map of the collaboration id and the center scheduler busy status. The key is the collaboration id, and the value is the center scheduler busy status of the collaboration with the collaboration id.
